title: [W]Respondent supporting material
caption: [W]Respond to an application
li1: [W]you can upload letters, photos or documents to support your response
li2: [W]if you are taking a picture of a letter, place it on a flat surface and take the picture from above
li3: [W]if you are uploading written documents with tracked changes, make sure that tracked changes are turned on

responseText.hint: [W]Use this box to provide any supporting material. You can also upload a file if you wish.

responseText.required: [W]Use the text box or file upload to give details
responseText.tooLong: [W]Give details (free text) must be entered as 2500 characters or less

supportingMaterialFile.invalidFileFormat: [W]The type of file you are trying to upload is not supported by our system. Please convert it into a common supported file type for example word, excel, pdf.
supportingMaterialFile.invalidFileName: [W]The name of the file provided is invalid. A file name cannot exceed 150 characters or contain any of the following characters: \/:*?"|<>
supportingMaterialFile.invalidFileSize: [W]The file you are trying to upload has exceeded the maximum file size limit, please reduce the size of the file.
supportingMaterialFile.backEndError: [W]There was an error uploading your file. Please try again. If this error persists please contact support.
